text:
@realDonaldTrump .@realDonaldTrump you moron!  This virus will NOT be soon forgotten, it is leaving a very deep & permanent scar on our nation.  The economy will not boom... even with the stimulus package many Americans & small businesses will not recover.
#COVID19 
#coronavirus 
#WednesdayWisdom
